title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: He began his coaching career with Hajduk Split in his native Croatia in 2013 and had spells with PAOK, Karabukspor, Galatasaray and Udinese (twice) before returning to Hajduk in 2020.

title: Igor Tudor Juventus: Player, Coach, and Now Manager - Italian Football
snippet: Igor Tudor was appointed Juventus manager in March 2025 after the sacking of Thiago Motta. Tudor previously served Juventus both as a player (1998-2007) and as an assistant coach under Andrea Pirlo (2020-2021).
